name: locations_v3_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hotels.
Tool description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travelling site/application, such as : hotels.com
API description: Search for related locations and suggestions based on the provided query string using the RapidAPI 'locations/v3/search' endpoint.

q.description: The query string representing names of countries, cities, districts, places, etc.

langid.description: The value of languageIdentifier field returned in .../v2/get-meta-data endpoint

siteid.description: The value of siteId field returned in .../v2/get-meta-data endpoint
